name: Classic Cheezy Burger
dis: The Classic Cheezy Burger is a mouthwatering favorite, featuring a juicy, grilled beef patty topped with melted cheddar cheese. Sandwiched between soft, crisp onions. This burger offers the perfect blend of flavors and textures, making it a satisfying choice for any meal. Simple yet delicious, the Classic Cheezy Burger is sure to hit the spot for anyone craving a classic burger experience.

name: Black Angus Burger
dis: The Black Angus Burger is a premium delight, featuring a perfectly seasoned Black Angus beef patty grilled to perfection. Served on a toasted bun, it’s topped with melted cheese, fresh lettuce, tomatoes, onions, and a special sauce that enhances the rich, bold flavors of the Angus beef. This burger promises a gourmet experience, with every bite .

name: #stayhome kit: 3 mini burger + 3 Pack Kraft Pepsi
